dt: {bc}a member of the priestly Hebrew tribe of Levi
{bc}a Levite of non-Aaronic descent assigned to lesser ceremonial offices under the {a_link|Levitical} priests of the family of Aaron

shortdef: a member of the priestly Hebrew tribe of Levi; specifically : a Levite of non-Aaronic descent assigned to lesser ceremonial offices under the Levitical priests of the family of Aaron
